sentences.en: A piece of string has twisted round the propeller.
sentences.cn: 一根绳子缠在螺旋桨上了.

sentences.en: A rope jammed the boat's propeller.
sentences.cn: 一根绳子卡住了船的螺旋桨。

sentences.en: Can you free the propeller from the weeds?
sentences.cn: 你能把螺旋桨上的草除掉 吗 ?

sentences.en: Propeller fans exhaust air through holes in the wall.
sentences.cn: 螺旋式通风机从壁孔中排出空气.
发动机使螺旋桨旋转起来。

sentences.en: The freighter fouled its propeller in fishing nets.
sentences.cn: 货船的螺旋桨被渔网缠住了。

sentences.en: The propeller blade has been mounted.
sentences.cn: 推进器的叶片已经安装好了.

sentences.en: The propeller can follow the wind velocity closely during hingspeed gusts.
sentences.cn: 螺旋桨在有高速狂风时能紧紧地追随风速.

sentences.en: The propeller of the steamboat churned ( up ) the waves.
sentences.cn: 汽船的 推进器 卷起 浪花.

sentences.en: The propeller started to spin around.
sentences.cn: 螺旋桨开始飞快地旋转起来.

sentences.en: The propeller will windmill and crank the engine.
sentences.cn: 螺旋浆将旋转并转动引擎的曲柄.

sentences.en: The timing of the gun was precisely synchronised with the turning of the plane's propeller.
sentences.cn: 风门的调速与飞机螺旋桨的转动精确同步.

sentences.en: The timing of the gun was precisely synchronized with the turning of the plane's propeller.
sentences.cn: 风门的调速与飞机螺旋桨的转动精确同步。

sentences.en: With a low-pitched rumbling noise, the propeller began to rotate.
sentences.cn: 伴随着隆隆的低沉噪声，螺旋桨开始旋转起来。

words.tran_cn: 推进物；推进燃料；发射火药
推动者；推进物；推进燃料
[航][船] 螺旋桨；推进者；[航][船] 推进器

phrases.tran_cn: 可调螺距螺旋桨；可变螺距螺旋桨；调距螺旋桨；可掂螺旋桨

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment consisting of two or more blades that spin around, which makes an aircraft or ship move
